Italic font here

Bi’ru is a new name given by Shuhan Ye in the video. In Chinese, the word ‘Bi’ru’ is homophonic with ‘for example’. Shuhan Ye has blurred the use of ‘Bi’ru’ as an example or as a name in her video.

The name Bi’ru refers narrowly to the anthropocentric perspective of plants and animals, but broadly to all carbon-based organisms, including humans themselves. The blurring of the boundaries of Bi’ru is meant to be a thought provoking joke, in which the fundamental anthropocentric opposition between humans and animals is blurred and blended into one.
